heading: Media outlets are biased
subHeading: But you don't have to be!

steps.description: Tell us your political leaning and some basic information about the type of content you see on your social media feed. Do you follow conservative media or liberal media outlets?
steps.heading: Tell us your viewpoint

steps.description: Find new sources and articles in a curated newsletter each week. Discover news from both sides and unbiased news instead of relying on the honesty of reporters.
steps.heading: Discover personalized news

steps.description: Improve your media literacy by getting your news from multiple media outlets. Don't be fooled by the biased news on your social media feed again!
steps.heading: Leave your echo chamber
